name: Progressive Corporation
summary: The Progressive Corporation, founded in 1937 and headquartered in Mayfield Village, Ohio, is one of the largest auto insurers in the United States and a leading provider of personal and commercial insurance products. The company offers a wide range of insurance solutions, including auto, motorcycle, boat, RV, home, and business-related coverage, and serves customers directly and through more than 40,000 independent agencies. Progressive is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker PGR and ranks #62 on the 2024 Fortune 500 list.
